hints.content:
We need to know the total number of times Brady and Jenny hopped.

![A tape diagram models that Brady's 72 hops and Jenny's 92 hops are equal to an unknown total number of hops.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ca62e2ba2744b36cea610369dfcb4090718a14be)

$\maroonD{73}+\blueE{92} = \purpleD{?}$

$\begin{align}
\maroonD{73}+\blueE{92} &=\maroonD{70}+\blueE{90} + \maroonD{3} + \blueE{2} \\\\
&= 160 +5
\\\\
&=\purpleD{165}
\end{align}$

![Place value blocks show 7 tens plus 9 tens plus 3 plus 2.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/87b634d1cf84d8cf60d26820a9568082d5d73229)
Brady and Jenny hopped $\purpleD{165}$ times in all.

question.content:
The table shows how many times each child hopped in a relay.

Child | Hops
:- | -:
Brady | $73$
Gage | $62$
Jenny | $92$

**How many times did Brady and Jenny hop in all?**

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] times
